mapper.update: update judge_record set runtime= (select avg(runtime) from judge_record_sample where record_id=#{recordId}), memory=(select avg(memory) from judge_record_sample where record_id=#{recordId}), submit_status=(select max(result_code) from judge_record_sample where record_id=#{recordId}), pass_rate=(select sum(if(result_code=3,1,0))/sum(1) from judge_record_sample where record_id=#{recordId}) where id=#{recordId}
mapper.select: select a.id as recordId,a.problem_id as problemId,a.submit_content as submitCode,language_type as languageType, time_limit as timeLimit,memory_limit as memoryLimit,sample_num as sampleNum from judge_record a join problem_code b on a.problem_id=b.id where a.id=#{recordId}
select submit_status from judge_record where id=#{recordId}

select id, problem_id, problem_type, source, source_id, user_id, submit_time, submit_content, submit_img, language_type, submit_status, pass_rate, runtime, memory, judge_type, judge_user, judge_reason, update_time from judge_record where problem_id=#{problemId} and problem_type=#{problemType} and source=#{source} and source_id=#{sourceId}
